title: Private Balcony, Eat-In Kitchen, BBQ & Picnic Area
posting_body: ['At South Glen Apartments, our legendary service, incredible value, and warm community spirit are designed to offer you a superior living experience.', 'Each home in South Glen has both front and back window exposure providing a light, airy atmosphere.', ' A landscaped courtyard accents the front of each building cluster while large expanses of open space separate each court, assuring backyard privacy.', 'Located in Brownstown Township, between Allen Road and Fort Street provides direct access to nearby schools, shopping centers and major employers.', '-Resident Lounge with Free Wi-Fi', '-Microwave', '-High Speed Internet Access', '-Double Sinks', '-Large Closet', '-Energy Efficient Appliances', '-Disability Access', '-High-Speed Internet Access', '-Separate Shower', '-Wired for Technology', '-Window Coverings', '-Private Balcony', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
